com.github.javactic

Class Fail<T>

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.github.javactic.Fail<T>
  • Type Parameters:
    T - the type of value describing a validation failure for this Fail
    All Implemented Interfaces:
    Validation<T>, Serializable

    public class Fail<T>
extends Object
implements Validation<T>, Serializable
    Indicates a validation failed, describing the failure with a contained error value.
    Author:
    mvh
    See Also:
    Serialized Form
